summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges associated with various shipments made by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It includes information on transportation charges, discounts, and specific shipment details, including recipients and delivery dates.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling USD 170.15 for various packages sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Multiple shipments were made on dates including March 31, April 1, April 2, and April 3, 2003.
Discounts totaling USD 19.50 were applied to the shipping charges.
